channel.title: Moparscape awards 2010
channel.description:
I was reading [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,417747.0.html]this thread[/url] and decided to post one for 2010. :) Just click select, copy and paste as a new reply!
[code]- Spammer of the year: - Newest User(Rookie) of the year: - Funniest of the year: - Admin of the year: - Sectional Moderator of the year: - Global Moderator of the year: - Best overall staff member of the year: - Best poster of the year: - Forum of the year (such as General, Help, etc): - Ban of the year (which person who has been banned received the most epic banning): - Model artist of the year: - Friendliest of the year: - Most helpful of the year: - Most annoying member of the year: - Thread of the year:[/code]
[hr]
- Spammer of the year: I Vain I - Newest User(Rookie) of the year: - Funniest of the year: N/A (we don't have trolls anymore :() - Admin of the year: Lothy - Sectional Moderator of the year: N/A - Global Moderator of the year: thepinksock - Best overall staff member of the year: The Reaper X - Best poster of the year: N/A - Forum of the year (such as General, Help, etc): MoparScape General Discussion - Ban of the year (which person who has been banned received the most epic banning): [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431980.0.html]`Lewk_ and AMERIKA[/url] - Model artist of the year: N/A - Friendliest of the year: Scape-JAVA - Most helpful of the year: I Vain I - Most annoying member of the year: Davidi2 - Thread of the year: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4659560.0.html

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:36, topic:375115"]I’d like to thank you all for my nominations, the amount of people was just so outrageous I figured I had to contribute.

best new people: john
best old people: davidi2, morgan freeman
ban of the year: wade did indeed go out in style with lewk
friendliest of the year: evil_
most helpful of the year: neither jc or vain, probably davidi2
most annoying member of the year: all of the player haters on this thread and that abskater retard
best staff member: mdog, taharok, evil, newty, niall
retard of the year: that abskater retard[/quote]Agreed to the retard bit etc.

item.title: Moparscape awards 2010
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  • Spammer of the year: Davidi2
  • Newest User(Rookie) of the year: Cole1497
  • Funniest of the year: People try to act funny, tbh.
  • Admin of the year: Moparisthebest ofc.
  • Sectional Moderator of the year: No one, really.
  • Global Moderator of the year: Taharok<3
  • Best overall staff member of the year: Moparisthebest ofc again.
  • Best poster of the year: Not many good posts this (last) year. ;\
  • Forum of the year (such as General, Help, etc): Definitely general.
  • Ban of the year (which person who has been banned received the most epic banning): …and how’s a ban epic again?
  • Model artist of the year: No idea.
  • Friendliest of the year: pure2ownage
  • Most helpful of the year: Definitely not me; will try harder this year!
  • Most annoying member of the year: Davidi2
  • Thread of the year: Too many to list.

Read full topic
